text: Rahim Moeini Kermanshahi (, February 6, 1926 â€“ November 17, 2015) was an Iranian poet and lyricist. He was one of the pioneering songwriters in the history of Persian traditional music. He was born in Kermanshah, Iran. During his 60 years dedication to Persian literature and poetry he published over 20 books and wrote the lyrics of about 500 songs. Kermanshahi died at the age of 89 at a hospital in Tehran, Iran ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Iranian poets Category:People from Kermanshah Province
title: Rahim Moeini Kermanshahi
